kylegreeninventorysystem

Class inputValidation

  • java.lang.Object
    • kylegreeninventorysystem.inputValidation

  • public class inputValidation
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to validate user input into text fields, before it is added to the inventory.

      • isValidInv

        public static boolean isValidInv(int inv,
                                 int min,
                                 int max)
        Determines if the inv, min and max inputs are valid.
        Parameters:
        inv - The current quantity in stock
        min - The minimum quantity required
        max - The maximum quantity allowed
        Returns:
        Boolean value if the inputs are valid

      • isValidMin

        public static boolean isValidMin(int min,
                                 int max)
        Determines if min input is less than max.
        Parameters:
        min - The minimum quantity required
        max - The maximum quantity allowed
        Returns:
        Boolean value if the inputs are valid

      • isDouble

        public static boolean isDouble(java.lang.String input)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Determines if the input is a Double
        Parameters:
        input - The user input into the price field
        Returns:
        Whether the input is a double
        Throws:
